subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Wayne Rooney scored in the 42nd minute as defending champion Manchester United defeated visiting Fulham, 1-0, to open a 3-point lead over Manchester City in England’s Premier League.
snippet: Wayne Rooney scored in the 42nd minute as defending champion Manchester United defeated visiting Fulham, 1-0, to open a 3-point lead over Manchester City in England’s Premier League.
